scripts.deploy: copy cloudbuild.yaml .output && copy Dockerfile .output && cd .output && gcloud builds submit --config cloudbuild.yaml --timeout=2h --substitutions=_DOCKER_IMAGE=us-central1-docker.pkg.dev/deephow-dev/ai-demos/research-ai-quiz --gcs-log-dir=gs://deephow-dev-build-log/ai-demos/research-ai-quiz/ && gcloud run deploy research-ai-quiz --image us-central1-docker.pkg.dev/deephow-dev/ai-demos/research-ai-quiz --region us-central1 --platform managed --timeout 900 --cpu 1 --memory 2Gi --max-instances 1 --allow-unauthenticated --port 3000 --set-env-vars "GCP=true"
